trends: There have been no other sightings in Montpelier
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was trying to go to sleep when I noticed 5 lights in the reflection of the T.V. through the window. i was curious because there was no noise. i looked out the window and saw an out line of a triangle outside the lights. when it dissapered behind the trees about 5 minutes later a Black helicopter with no visible markings followed the same flight path with a searchlight at a fairly high speed.
